name: R.T.O. Tales of the Dark Lands - Deluxe Edition
name_original: R.T.O. Tales of the Dark Lands - Deluxe Edition
description:
.



Welcome to the Dark land, better known as Gourland and accompanies
this hero through this dangerous land, filled with wild creatures
and giant colossus, which will not let you complete your mission.



.


- 9 levels and 15 maps of the platform action retro 16-bit style.

- Different routes to explore these dark dungeons.

- 5 giant boss.

- Set entirely in pixelart.

- Increase your weapons and upload level.

- Soundtrack symphonic rock.

- Based on the book Tales of the Dark Lands.

- Difficulty Retro.
